title: The Difficult Sister
description: Second in the Emma Golden mystery series, this novel features Portland, Oregon-based Emma Golden, a "woman of a certain age" who finds herself investigating the mysteries that pop up in her life. In this installment, Emma and her friend Melody journey to the southern Oregon coast in an attempt to located Melody's sister, who ran off with a man she met on a computer dating site. The two women quickly find themselves in a series of events including menacing, murder, and even romance amid a web of increasingly dire circumstances.
author: Judy Nedry
